register.description: The control register configures the Display Controller module for the VP output. Shadow register

bitfield.description: Transparency Color Key Selection 0h = Destination transparency color key selected 1h = Source transparency color key selected
Transparency Color Key Enable 0h = Disable the transparency color key for the LCD 1h = Enable the transparency color key for the LCD

register.description: The control register configures the default solid background color LSB[31:0]. Shadow register
The control register configures the default solid background color MSB[47:32]. Shadow register
The register sets the max transparency color value for the overlays. Shadow register

bitfield.description: LSB[31:0]. Transparency Color Key Value in 36-bit RGB format

register.description: The register sets the max transparency color value for the overlays. Shadow register

bitfield.description: MSB[35:32]. Transparency Color Key Value in 36-bit RGB format

register.description: The register sets the min transparency color value for the overlays. Shadow register

bitfield.description: LSB[31:0]. Transparency Color Key Value in 36-bit RGB format

register.description: The register sets the min transparency color value for the overlays. Shadow register

bitfield.description: MSB[35:32]. Transparency Color Key Value in 36-bit RGB format

register.description: The register configures the attributes of layer-0, ZORDER= 0, of the Overlay manager. Shadow register

bitfield.description: Y position of the layer. Encoded value [from 0 to 4095] to specify the Y position of the layer on the screen. The line at the top has the Y-position 0
X position of the layer. Encoded value [from 0 to 4095] to specify the X position of the layer on the screen. The first pixel on the left of the screen has the X-position 0
Input channel connected to Layer 0h = VID is connected to the layer 1h = VIDL-1 is connected to the layer Others = Reserved

register.description: The register configures the attributes of layer-1, ZORDER= 1, of the Overlay manager. Shadow register

bitfield.description: Y position of the layer. Encoded value [from 0 to 4095] to specify the Y position of the layer on the screen. The line at the top has the Y-position 0
X position of the layer. Encoded value [from 0 to 4095] to specify the X position of the layer on the screen. The first pixel on the left of the screen has the X-position 0
Input channel connected to Layer 0h = VID is connected to the layer 1h = VIDL-1 is connected to the layer Others = Reserved
